# uptime_statuspage_current_status (Data Source)

Retrieve the current operational status of a status page including component statuses.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `statuspage_id` (Number) ID of the status page to retrieve current status for

### Read-Only

- `components` (Attributes List) Current status of all components (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--components))
- `global_is_operational` (Boolean) Whether the status page is operational (all components operational)
- `id` (String) Placeholder identifier for the data source

<a id="nestedatt--components"></a>
### Nested Schema for `components`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) Status description
- `id` (Number) Component ID
- `name` (String) Component name
- `status` (String) Current status of the component
